Class NTGBW2NBWOptions

java.lang.Object

              org.svvrl.goal.core.Properties

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
public class NTGBW2NBWOptions
extends Properties

This class provides options for the conversion from NTGBW to equivalent NBW.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form

ReduceBeforeMergeKey

public static final java.lang.String ReduceBeforeMergeKey
The key of the option of reducing dead states before merging equivalent states if the conversion algorithm is #NTGBW2NBWByLTL2BA.
